column1:
fieldset {
      background: #FCFCFC;
      padding: 16px;
      border: 1px solid #D5D5D5;
    }
    .addfields {
      margin: 10px 0;
    }
    #choicesDisplay {
      padding: 10px;
      background: rgb(227, 250, 227);
      border: 1px solid rgb(171, 239, 171);
      color: rgb(9, 56, 9);
    }
    .remove {
      background: #C76868;
      color: #FFF;
      font-weight: bold;
      font-size: 21px;
      border: 0;
      cursor: pointer;
      display: inline-block;
      padding: 4px 9px;
      vertical-align: top;
      line-height: 100%;   
    }
    input[type=""text""],
    select {
      padding: 5px;
    }
